profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in full-stack development using **Python**, **SQL**, and **API development**. Proficient in building distributed systems and developing concurrent code, I have integrated **Docker** and **K8s** into my workflows to enhance application deployment and scalability. I have a proven track record of using **Ansible** and **TeamCity** for CI/CD automation, as well as implementing effective **monitoring** and **alerting** systems.

My technical acumen extends to **GCP** for cloud solutions and agile prototyping techniques such as sketching, enabling rapid development cycles. I also possess a strong foundation in developing high-performance solutions, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors, while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. My expertise includes modern frameworks and libraries such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, as well as server-side technologies including **FastAPI** and **Django**. Additionally, I have led projects that integrate AI/ML capabilities for analytics and automation, and I am experienced in advanced MLOps workflows utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
